name: Psycho Pinball
overview: Ride the ghost train, freak on the flume, or try your luck on Moonsquares the fab bonus arcade game. This challenging table is your gateway to The Abyss, Wild West and Trick or Treat in the Multi-Table Game. Eye of toad and wing of bat. Multi ball hides in the Haunted Tree, beware the Pit of Doom, the Pumpkin Head leads to a spooky place, and the cat holds the key to the broom. Other Features - Multi-table or Single Table games - 50 frames a second update rate - Dynamic L.E.D. score panel - 3 difficulty levels: Easy, Normal or Hard - Trigger and Plunger launchers - Double height table
